Replying to @jaffathecake 2020-04-18 09:27
@jaffathecake Horrible. I’ve been through this a few times. Suggest asking all neighbours in the area to check their sheds and garages. We once found one in a shed 2 doors away after 3 days of looking. Also know of cats being found after long spells of absense. Don’t give up hope.
